A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the anticipation for this movie was massive\, I don't feel it lives up to the hype. While it has its moments\, such as the business with Luke\, nothing really stands out about this film. It seemed to drag on for quite some time\, and discards all original trilogy characters in favor of the new ones. While \"The Force Awakens\" got me excited for the new chapters in the Star Wars legacy\, this movie left me wanting much more\, and dreading future installments.
